front.title: Format for Diffserv Working Group Traffic Conditioner Drafts

abstract.t: This draft outlines the format and required content for trafficconditioner drafts that are submitted to the DifferentiatedServices Working Group (Diff-Serv). This format is specified toexpedite working group review of traffic conditioner submissions.The keywords 'MUST', 'MUST NOT', 'REQUIRED', 'SHOULD', 'SHOULD NOT',and 'MAY' that appear in this document are to beinterpreted as described in [RFC2119].
